Class ManagerInventoryController

java.lang.Object
ManagerInventoryController
public class ManagerInventoryController extends Object
This controller handles manager inventory operations such as viewing, adding, updating, and removing ingredients. It also includes navigation to other manager-related screens.
Author:
Avanthika Ayyadurai

  • Method Details

    • handleViewIngredient

      public void handleViewIngredient(ActionEvent event)
      This function runs when the "View Ingredient" button is clicked. It fetches and displays ingredient information from the database.
      Parameters:
      event - action event triggered by button click

    • handleAddIngredient

      public void handleAddIngredient(ActionEvent event)
      This function runs when the "Add Ingredient" button is clicked. It inserts a new ingredient record into the database.
      Parameters:
      event - action event triggered by button click

    • handleUpdateIngredient

      public void handleUpdateIngredient(ActionEvent event)
      This function runs when the "Update Ingredient" button is clicked. It updates the supply and/or cost of an ingredient in the database.
      Parameters:
      event - action event triggered by button click

    • handleRemoveIngredient

      public void handleRemoveIngredient(ActionEvent event)
      This function runs when the "Remove Ingredient" button is clicked. It deletes an ingredient from the database based on its ID.
      Parameters:
      event - action event triggered by button click
